name: Don't Bee a Plant, always Worm up!
name_original: Don't Bee a Plant, always Worm up!
description:
We would like to proudly present our new game, created for Godot Wild Jam #20.

It's a game where main character will discover endless ways of life and death cycle. Our main source of inspiration was reincarnation, which we believe, perfectly suits the jam's theme "Every end is the new beginning". By playing this game, you will be able to control 4 different beings, where each of them is different.

Most assets were made entirely by team members. Although, we have used font "Great wishes" (link here: https://www.dafont.com/great-wishes.font) and one sound taken from "8bitretrogamesfx" pack. Thanks to the creators of those wonderful assets!

Controls:

Arrows - movement

R - restart level

EDIT: We have found an issue, which is not displaying quotes after death correctly. There was also some issues regarding camera. It's fixed now!
